Dgame.Graphics.Moveable



abstract class Moveable;
Basic implementation for moveable objects

Author:
rschuett

protected void _positionMoved(float dx, float dy);
Overloadable method if the position is moved.

protected void _positionReset(float nx, float ny);
Overloadable method if the position is reset.

protected const void _applyTranslation();
Apply translation to the object.

void resetTranslation();
Overloadable method to reset the position. The position is set to 0|0.

final void setPosition(ref const Vector2f vec);
Setting a new position.

final void setPosition(float x, float y);
Setting a new position.

final const pure nothrow ref const(Vector2f) getPosition();
Returns the current position.

final inout pure nothrow @property ref inout(Vector2f) position();
Returns an inout reference to the coordinates. It should be used to set or get the x and y coordinates. If you (re)set the position herewith, it doesn't appear in positionMovedpositionReset
final void move(ref const Vector2f vec);
Move the current position by vec.

final void move(float x, float y);
Move the current position by x|y.
